thread.title: Kerry to visit Milan Expo on weekend trip to Europe
thread.title_full: Kerry to visit Milan Expo on weekend trip to Europe

author: MATTHEW LEE
title: Kerry to visit Milan Expo on weekend trip to Europe
text:
Kerry heads to Europe, will visit Milan Expo, Paris, Madrid 
By MATTHEW LEE - AP Diplomatic Writer Published: 10/15/15 2:04 pm EDT - Updated: 10/15/15 2:04 pm EDT 
WASHINGTON â€” Secretary of State John Kerry is heading to Europe for a weekend trip that will take him to Italy, France and Spain. 
The State Department said Thursday that Kerry will visit the Milan Expo, which is focused on food security. He'll hold talks Saturday in Milan with Italy's foreign minister expected to focus on the crisis in Syria and bilateral issues. 
From Italy, Kerry will travel to France for a brief stop in Paris to speak in favor of the U.S. bid for re-election to the executive board of the UN cultural agency based there. 
Kerry will travel to Spain on Sunday for talks with senior Spanish officials in Madrid.
